title: ★Condo Available For Rent Minutes Away From Midtown★
posting_body: IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME
I MAY HAVE OTHER PROPERTIES TO PASS BY YOU
Welcome to the lofts at the Detroit Design District, a newly completed development located on the border between North End and Milwaukee Junction, just minutes from Midtown and New Center.
Formerly the Maurice Fox Ford sales and service station, the three-story building features retail space on the first floor and 18 industrial-style lofts on the second and third floors.
Walk to Woodward Avenue and the Q-Line or to one of Milwaukee Junction’s numerous restaurants, coffee shops, art galleries, bars and creative studios.
Modern design combined with original detail sets these lofts apart from the rest.

Each unit features an open kitchen design with stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry from Reform, and quartz countertops; in-unit laundry; Latch keyless entry; and Rocket Fiber internet capability.
The development also includes an activated alley with an outdoor gathering space.
Gated off-street parking is available for an additional monthly fee.

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
The buyer is advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection and with appropriate professionals.
